references.paper_title: Pointnet: Deep learning on point sets for 3d classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced PointNet, a groundbreaking approach to directly process 3D point cloud data using deep learning, significantly influencing subsequent research in the field.

references.paper_title: Pointnet++: Deep hierarchical feature learning on point sets in a metric space
references.reason: PointNet++ extended PointNet by introducing a hierarchical structure to capture local features effectively, enabling improved performance on large-scale point cloud tasks.
This paper introduced the Point Transformer, which used attention mechanisms to capture global context, improving accuracy and scalability in point cloud learning.

references.paper_title: Point transformer v2: Grouped vector attention and partition-based pooling
references.reason: Point Transformer v2 improved upon the original Point Transformer by addressing computational efficiency, allowing for better performance on large point clouds.

references.paper_title: Pointnext: Revisiting pointnet++ with improved training and scaling strategies
references.reason: PointNeXt offered improvements to the PointNet++ architecture, leading to enhanced accuracy and scalability in 3D point cloud tasks.
